events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles focused on backend development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was successful, and we are moving you to the next stage.
Thank you for your prompt responses during the screening; we appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 10 AM to discuss your software development skills.
